text.tspan: There is no denying the fact that the success of an advertisement
lies mostly in the headline. The headline should attract the reader
and make him read the rest of the advertisement. The headline
should be simply catchy and various key points should be
embedded when deciding on the headline for the ad. The headline
should catch attention of the eye at the first glance. Words in
headlines should act as tags for the advertisement. It should say it
all about the content that follows. If a company is selling reasonably
What If They Let You Run The Hubble
